amendment.description: To increase amounts available for the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act State grant program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3982 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3982 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Casey to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5904; text: CR S5904) To increase amounts available for the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act State grant program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3982 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Casey to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3982 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
